11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Jabir narrated:"We said: 'O Messenger of Allah! We practice Azl, but the Jews claim that it is minor infanticide.' So he said: 'The Jews lie. When Allah wants to create it, nothing can prevent Him

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Azl
